title.rendered: Is Toluna Influencers Mexico trustworthy?  Pay or scam?  real opinions

content.rendered:
Toluna Influencers is one of the paid survey websites in mexico and Latin America of the most favorites in general.
It has more than 13 million users worldwide; a fairly significant figure to consider the panel as one of the best for Internet surveys.

More, if you take into account that it is fully managed by the largest market research company in the world. It is motivated by this that it becomes necessary to unravel all that it has to offer; being able to do it with this analysis where I also give you my opinions about Toluna in this regard.

Main features of Toluna

Toluna is a simple and even fun website where you can take all kinds of paid surveys. It is managed by the Toluna group; which is in charge of the largest market research company in the world today.

It is therefore: a community where you share your opinion about certain products and services and then be rewarded for it.

At the first moment of using it you can appreciate the following panel features Toluna Influencers:

  • It is a website whose modular interface is simple and very attractive to look at.
  • It has a platform with a wide variety of languages ​​to which you can choose. This indicates that the web accepts a large number of countries so that users from all over the world can generate money by filling out surveys; among them, Spain, Mexico, Argentina, Colombia and Chile.
  • Your payment options include PayPal deposits and gift vouchers from various Toluna affiliated stores. These gifts vary depending on the country where you are.
  • Same as other internet survey sites; Toluna works with a point system which allows you to exchange those points you get doing surveys for the aforementioned prizes.
  • For each survey you take you will receive between 1,000 and 20,000 points, depending on the survey of course.
  • Not only do you have surveys to earn points; but you can also get them with other activities that will be explained below.
  • Being a website managed by a large market research company; it guarantees total security and trust with the personal data that you must provide.

Ways to earn money and prizes on Toluna Influencers

If you have followed the steps above; All that remains is to wait for Toluna to send you all those surveys that you want to do so much to your email. Yes indeed; This is not the only way to get points in Toluna, highlighting these other ways to monetize on the platform:

  • You can monetize with the sponsored content found in the survey menu. These are quick votes capable of giving you up to 15 points for each answer you give.
  • Access the offers section where you can register on the different platforms associated with Toluna and also get additional points.
  • There is a free samples section on the website where you can sign up and see if you are selected to try a particular product. This product you can keep it of course. You can access this section by clicking on the main menu, where it says “explore” and “sandbox”.

All that remains is to try and monetize!

How to register in Toluna?

To register in Toluna you must first be of legal age and have an Internet connection. If you meet these requirements, it will only be necessary to enter the official Toluna page, which you can do by clicking on the following link:

“Choose the link for your country, so you can register without problems”

Mexico Argentina Spain Colombia Chile

Done this; You must go to the upper right part of the window and click on the “register” button. There you will see a very dynamic interface where you must enter your personal data such as name, surname and email.

Once you have filled in your main data, Toluna will send you an email to the email provided so that you can validate your Toluna user. You will have to go directly to your inbox; look for the email and click on the link there to have full access to your Toluna account. Very easy! Or not?

It is worth mentioning that the Toluna interface can change depending on which country you are in. However, the steps remain the same.

What to do first in Toluna?

Before you start taking surveys on Toluna, The first thing you should do once you have created your user is to complete your entire profile. This will ask you as if it were another survey; having to fill it out as soon as possible. Only then can you ensure that Toluna sends you surveys on a daily basis!

To correctly fill out your Toluna Influencers profile, try to take into account the following:
Try to place in “level of education” bachelor’s, diploma or doctorate.
Put between 20,000 and 40,000 dollars per year in the question of what is your income. If you do not manage with dollars then you have the conversion to the currency you use by entering here.

Denote that you are employed and in a mid-level position when asked about your job.
Answer yes to the question of whether you are responsible for your home purchases.
Indicate that you have at least one child under the age of 18. Similarly, indicate that more than three people live in your house.
Responding in this way will guarantee that the platform sends you a large number of surveys and, therefore; that you have more opportunities to make money filling out online surveys.

Remember that these kinds of web pages are looking for people who buy, go on a trip or spend money in a high and continuous way in their daily lives.

go to Toluna MX registration page

Opinions and final conclusion about Toluna Influencers

I’m not really going to lie to you; Mexico is one of my favorite websites to monetize doing surveys. They always send you just the right amount of surveys so you can make some extra money and not completely disengage from the platform. Is trustworthy; fast and they always pay, although sometimes it can take up to 2 weeks to pay. Still, it is safe to use this platform.

Its catalog of rewards is very varied and you can also exchange your points for cash from PayPal.

The only negative thing I can observe about the platform is that the rewards vary depending on the country you are in. In addition, you need to collect at least $35 in points (which is approximately 140,000 points) to withdraw the rewards. It is something high without a doubt, but it is not impossible to reach this goal.

I highly recommend this platform as it is easy to use, simple and pays on time in most cases. Are you excited then?
